resourcesRoot.description: The root path for APP resources such as JavaScript files and images. Needs to be relative within the package.

ssrBootstrap.description: An optional local SSR bootstrap that returns an initial HTML for the App, relative within the package. Needs to export a function compatible to MashroomPortalAppPluginSSRBootstrapFunction.

resourcesRoot.description: The root path for App resources such as JavaScript files and images

ssrInitialHtmlPath.description: The path to a route that renders the initial HTML. The route will receive a POST with a JSON body with a "portalAppSetup" property.

editorPortalApp.description: The name of the Portal App that should be used to edit the appConfig of this App (Default: in-place)

appConfig.description: The appConfig the editor App should be launched with (Default: {})

path.description: Name to the JavaScript or CSS file

dynamicResource.description: The name of the dynamic resource that should be added

rule.description: Optional rule property refers to a rule in the instantiated plugin (bootstrap)
Optional rule property refers to a rule in the instantiated plugin (bootstrap)

loads.description: The plugin type this loader can load

path.description: The default path where the WebApp will be available
The default path where the API will be available

order.description: The weight of the middleware in the stack - the higher it is the later it will be executed (Default: 1000)

documentRoot.description: Defines the local root path of the documents

path.description: The default path where the static documents will be available

namespace.description: Defines the path to the services. The services ill be accessible through pluginContext.services.myNamespace.service

target.description: The actual web-app or static plugin that should be integrated

menuTitle.description: The name that should be appear in the Admin UI menu

path.description: The path in the Admin UI (full path will be /mashroom/admin/ext/<your path>)

height.description: The height of the iframe that will contain the target webapp (Default: 80vh)

weight.description: The weight of the menu entry, the higher the number the lower will be menu entry be (Default: 100)

cronSchedule.description: The execution schedule for the job, must be a valid cron expression, see: https://github.com/node-cron/node-cron

order.description: The weight of the middleware in the stack - the higher it is the **later** it will be executed (Default: 1000)

clientBootstrap.description: A global function that implements MashroomPortalAppPluginBootstrapFunction and starts the App within the given host element

resources.description: Javascript and CSS resources that must be loaded before the bootstrap method is invoked.

sharedResources.description: Optional. Same as resources but a shared resource with a given name is only loaded once, even if multiple Portal Apps declare it.

screenshots.description: Optional some screenshots of the App. The screenshots paths are relative to resourcesRoot

local.description: Basic configuration if the App is deployed locally.

remote.description: Optional configuration if the App is accessed remotely.

title.description: Optional human readable title of the App. Can be a string or an object with translations.

category.description: An optional category to group the Apps in the Admin App

tags.description: A list of tags that can also be used in the search (in the Admin App)

description.description: Optional App description. Can be a string or an object with translations.

defaultRestrictViewToRoles.description: Optional default list of roles that have the VIEW permission if not set via Admin App.

rolePermissions.description: Optional mapping between App specific permissions and roles. This corresponds to the permission object passed with the user information to the App

editor.description: Optional custom editor configuration that should be used for the appConfig by the Portal Admin Toolbar.

targetUri.description: The API target URI (HTTP, HTTPS or WebSocket)

sendPermissionsHeader.description: Add the header X-USER-PERMISSIONS with a comma separated list of permissions calculated from rolePermissions (Default: false)

restrictToRoles.description: Optional list of roles that are permitted to access the proxy

metaInfo.description: Optional meta info that could be used to lookup for Apps with specific features or capabilities

appConfig.description: The default configuration that will be passed to the App. Can be adapted in the Admin App

resourcesRoot.description: Folder that contains assets (can be accessed in the theme via resourcesBasePath)

views.description: The folder with the views. There must exist a view  portal which renders a portal page

layouts.description: A map with the layout html files (on the local file system)

resourcesRoot.description: The root path for APP resources such as JavaScript files and images. Needs to be relative within the package.

pageResources.description: A list of JavaScript and CSS resourced that should be added to all portal pages

priority.description: The weight of the resources- the higher it is the **later** they will be added to the page (Default: 1000)

portalCustomClientServices.description:
A map of client services that should be injected in the clientServices object the Portal Apps receive.
The value needs to be an existing global variable on the page (in window)
